subject: Re: I hope this mail meets you w
body:
Dear Paul,

I am in receipt of your email, and the content
therein was well noted. Of course, I responded immediately and was
wondering why you didn't get my message or replied to it until a few
days ago after sending a reminder. Like I informed earlier in my
immediate past response, I live and work in the states and the funds
are here too.

 The transfer costs/fees will be subtracted and charged from the
funds. You and I will handle the onetime payment of the legal and
documentation fees. However, I am honest, and this transaction is
real/legitimate. Here are the attachments of my work I'd and documents
of our late client as proved.

Kindly get back to me for more details if you are interested in this
transaction.

Best Regards.
Mary K. Bosell
